availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Byassee (Hickman Co. farmer & miller)

body.p: Virginia native. Married Elvira Catherine Winfree Byassee in Lunenberg County, Virginia, on September 27, 1847. Carpenter in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Clinton, Kentucky, in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton District, p. 72. List of Executors and Administrators, 1852-1896, Hickman County, Kentucky in Ancestry.com, Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2015. Ancestry.com, Virginia, Compiled Marriages, 1740-1850 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 1999.
